argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | islidl.s | |- U = ( LIdeal ` R ) |
| 2 |  | islidl.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 3 |  | islidl.p | |- .+ = ( +g ` R ) |
| 4 |  | islidl.t | |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) |
| 5 |  | #P_rlmsca2 | |- ( _I ` R ) = ( Scalar ` ( ringLMod ` R ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_baseid | |- Base = Slot ( Base ` ndx ) |
| 7 | 6, 2 | #P_strfvi | |- B = ( Base ` ( _I ` R ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_rlmbas | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` ( ringLMod ` R ) ) |
| 9 | 2, 8 | #P_eqtri | |- B = ( Base ` ( ringLMod ` R ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_rlmplusg | |- ( +g ` R ) = ( +g ` ( ringLMod ` R ) ) |
| 11 | 3, 10 | #P_eqtri | |- .+ = ( +g ` ( ringLMod ` R ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_rlmvsca | |- ( .r ` R ) = ( .s ` ( ringLMod ` R ) ) |
| 13 | 4, 12 | #P_eqtri | |- .x. = ( .s ` ( ringLMod ` R ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_lidlval | |- ( LIdeal ` R ) = ( LSubSp ` ( ringLMod ` R ) ) |
| 15 | 1, 14 | #P_eqtri | |- U = ( LSubSp ` ( ringLMod ` R ) ) |
| 16 | 5, 7, 9, 11, 13, 15 | #P_islss | |- ( I e. U <-> ( I C_ B /\ I =/= (/) /\ A. x e. B A. a e. I A. b e. I ( ( x .x. a ) .+ b ) e. I ) ) |
